post.title: Bluez4 A2DP
post.excerpt: Bluez A2DP This diagram summarises the events and sequences when a remote bluetooth device starts an A2DP protocol connection to start audio streaming.
post.content:
This diagram summarises the events and sequences when a remote bluetooth device starts an A2DP protocol connection to start audio streaming.
